articles.title: Epidemiological modelling indicates COVID-19 pandemic may recede in July if transmission is low - The Indian Express
articles.description: The IISER Kolkata model also indicates that if a national lockdown was not implemented, India could have faced a catastrophic pandemic, rivaling and probably exceeding the worst-hit nations.
articles.content: The IISER team consisted of scientists Dibyendu Nandi, Ayan Banerjee, Rajesh Nayak, PhD students Shaonwita Pal, Soumyaranjan Dash, and undergraduate students Agnibha Banerjee and Vishal Singh.The results of a new epidemiological modelling, released by researc… [+2938 chars]
